description: Demolition and rebuilding of the existing retaining wall and staircases to the Trent Park Mansion House Terrace.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
On 2 October 2017 and 5 October 2017 respectively, Berkeley Homes secured planning permission (ref. 16/04324/FUL, as amended under application ref. 19/02568/VAR) and listed building consent (ref. 16/04375/LBD) for the phased redevelopment of the former Middlesex University Campus, Trent Park for a mixed use, residential-led development. This included alterations to the Mansion House, and repair of the Terrace.

Please refer to the cover letter for further details.
